function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited balcony space leading to overcrowding and lack of distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread within apartment buildings","Mitigation":"Ensure balconies are of sufficient size to accommodate daily activities, reducing the need to move indoor activities outdoors","Technologies":"Building design and planning tools to optimize apartment layouts and balcony sizes","People":"Residents of multi-story apartment buildings","Owner":"Building developers and planners"},{"Description":"Inadequate work-from-home spaces leading to reduced productivity and comfort","Impact":"Increased stress and decreased productivity for remote workers","Mitigation":"Creating dedicated and comfortable workspaces within the home to support remote work","Technologies":"Furniture design and interior layout tools for home office spaces","People":"Remote workers","Owner":"Homeowners, interior designers, and employers"}]}
